author: uptodatedevelopers
title: STAKE POOL OPERATOR Kinshasa/DRC
description: As a community of IT developers, we do not have the possibility to contribute to the decentralization of the Cardano network in DRC.
solution: Contribute to the decentralization of the Cardano network by becoming a steak pool operator in Kinshasa / Democratic Republic of Congo(DRC)
experience: Startup working in the design of Mobile, Web and desktop applications; with more than 18 developers.
